name: Decked Out Knight
description:
Create your character, purchase equipment, and set off into The Wildlands! Adventure awaits you in this side-scrolling, pixel art journey with multiple endings!

Tweet us your decked out knights! @piratechipgames

Made by Jared and Ibrahim for Pirate Chip Games during a (self inflicted) week long game jam.

Art made in Aseprite, Music made in FL Studio, programmed in Godot Engine.
